_source.text: 1. Live Gain Premium Rich Protein Treatment : While purchasing Shiseido Tsubaki hair conditioner at People's Park, the shop assistant highly recommended this Korean brand conditioner as being even better than Tsubaki.

text: 1. Live Gain Premium Rich Protein Treatment : While purchasing Shiseido Tsubaki hair conditioner at **People's** **Park**, the shop assistant highly recommended this Korean brand conditioner as being even **better** **than** Tsubaki.
